mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, PARENT_COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) C WHERE COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.PARENT_COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENT_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO
